backend/main.mo: Actor exposing a transform proxy and a link‑preview fetcher using HTTPS validation and an external LinkPreview API.
feature_evidence.json: Feature‑evidence report listing revert‑related features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend file purposes and recent UI/content updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme tokens for light/dark modes and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the page title and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component rendering all site sections with a dark theme provider and smooth‑scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with brand block, quick links, social icons, and attribution bar using smooth‑scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/ImageOpenInNewTa: Utility component wrapping an image in a new‑tab link with hover scale animation.
frontend/src/components/LinkPreview.tsx: Link preview card handling loading, error fallback, and rich preview display via useLinkPreview.
frontend/src/components/MarqueeLinkPrevi: Horizontally scrolling marquee displaying repeated LinkPreview cards with gradient edge masks.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky header with scroll‑aware styling, desktop links, and a mobile slide‑out menu.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioDetails: Empty file placeholder for portfolio detail logic.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an About section with career background text and buttons for downloading a CV or viewing a portfolio.
frontend/src/components/sections/AskMyNa: Displays example narrative prompts and a button that scrolls to the contact section to open an assistant.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact form with validation, email composition, clipboard copying, and direct contact info.
frontend/src/components/sections/Experie: Shows a timeline of experience items with images, roles, descriptions, and achievement lists.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Full-screen hero with background image, headline, subheadline, description, and CTAs that scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/MarketN: Presents writing topics, a scrolling marquee of links, and buttons to browse notes or subscribe.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Empty placeholder file for a future Portfolio section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Section: Reusable section header component supporting a title, optional subtitle, and alignment settings.
frontend/src/components/sections/Selecte: Renders a grid of curated project signals with titles, descriptions, embeds, and link previews. Uses Card components and conditionally shows X posts or previews based on config.
frontend/src/components/sections/Selects: Displays a grid of featured work items using selectsContent, showing images, tags, metadata, and external links inside Card components. Includes a section header and styled layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Empty placeholder file for a future Services section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Strateg: Empty placeholder file for a future Strategic Transformations section.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatIBu: Empty placeholder file for a future What I Build section.
frontend/src/components/XPostEmbed.tsx: Embeds an X/Twitter post by loading the widgets script and rendering a blockquote linked to the tweet URL.
frontend/src/content/aboutContent.ts: Exports about text content consisting of three short descriptive paragraphs about professional background and focus.
frontend/src/content/aurientExperienceCo: Defines an experience item interface and exports a list of structured experience entries with roles, descriptions, highlights, and images.
frontend/src/content/aurientSelectsConte: Exports structured data for select featured projects including titles, categories, descriptions, tags, years, and images.
frontend/src/content/marketNotesWritingL: Exports an array of external writing URLs for market notes and articles.
frontend/src/content/portfolioData.ts: Deprecated file exporting an empty portfolio data array.
frontend/src/content/servicesData.ts: Deprecated file exporting an empty services data array.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Holds static site text including hero content, section titles, and subtitles used across the frontend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity loading, and status management for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinkPreview.ts: React Query hook that fetches link preview metadata via the backend actor, parsing and returning structured preview data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that backend-related React Query hooks belong here.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH color variables, dark mode theming, utility classes, scrollbars, neon effects, and marquee animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, importing global styles and rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/categoryLabels.ts: Provides mappings from category names to concise labels (AI, ART, TECH, CRYPTO, CULTURE) and utility functions to retrieve them.
frontend/src/utils/contactMessage.ts: Formats contact form fields into a structured message string.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, OKLCH color tokens, animations, typography, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, state versioning, and feature history including revert requirements.
